statements: DELETE FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE check_type = 'Documentation' AND result = false;
DELETE FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE id = 1 AND check_type = 'Pre-Production';
DELETE FROM QualityControlChecks WHERE result = FALSE OR compliance_notes IS NULL;
DELETE FROM compliance_results WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
DELETE FROM compliance_results WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM production_quality_checks WHERE stage_name = 'Final Inspection';
DELETE FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE stage_of_production = 'Final' AND check_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction WHERE id = 1 AND stage_of_production = 'Assembly'
